In his keynote speech Monday at the trade show, Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer rebutted that suggestion. Nokia's support will help Windows Phone overall to build strength versus other mobile platforms, Steve Ballmer said.`` That's not just good for Nokia, that's good for all our handset partners.''
